name: Petunia basics
description: Comming soon flippy basic-Ever since the petunia Basics was successfully funded, I've been working on a 1999-2016 version of the series. This htfoffers a small slice of a couple of new features that will be in the full game,  random events and and special structures. This demo only includes one level, but in it you'll find some new structures, and you'll also get to experience the new random events that activate every few minutes! The full game will include the new features shown in this demo, as well as randomly generated levels, field trip mini-games, multiple levels of increasing difficulty, and more. Not to mention lots of new characters and items!
